history.proof: intros. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx|Hx]|Hx]. - hauto use: Rlt_irrefl, Rle_lt_trans. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: sign_eq_1, Rplus_le_le_0_compat, Rlt_mult_inv_pos, sign_le, sign_ge_0, Rmult_le_0_l, sign_eq_m1. - hauto lq: on drew: off use: SIN_bound, sin_0, cos_PI, Ropp_neq_0_compat unfold: IZR.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "sign ?M2295 < sign ?M2296 \\/ sign ?M2295 = sign ?M2296" with "1 < 0 \\/ 1 = 0".
In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "0 < ?M2295 + ?M2296 \\/ 0 = ?M2295 + ?M2296" with "1 < 0 \\/ 1 = 0".
In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "0 < sign ?M2295 \\/ 0 = sign ?M2295" with "1 < 0 \\/ 1 = 0".
In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 < x Unable to unify "0 < x" with "1 <= 0".

The LHS of sign_eq_1 (sign _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "?M2295 * ?M2296 < 0 \\/ ?M2295 * ?M2296 = 0" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".
In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "0 < ?M2295 * / ?M2296" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".
In environment x : R H : x <= 0 Hx : 0 > x Unable to unify "0 < ?M2295 * / ?M2296" with "-1 < 0 \\/ -1 = 0".

original: intros x H. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx|Hx]|Hx]. - apply sign_le. + apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; auto. + apply sign_ge_0. apply Hx. - rewrite sign_eq_1; auto. apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; auto. - rewrite sign_eq_m1; auto. apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat. + apply Rmult_le_0_l. apply Fourier_util.Rlt_mult_inv_pos; auto. + apply Rlt_mult_inv_pos; auto.
